creditline: Gift of David L. and Mary M.D. Parker
description: Color photo-montage of interior scene with a sink at center with dishes on a drying rack and a blue cabinet above sink, and a view into a bathroom at right with the head of a person wearing sunglasses in the bathtub; two woman at left--shoulder and back of head of woman wearing a brown tank top with cutout, with a blue bird on her PR shoulder, holding a telephone receiver, and a woman in a pink jacket looking over her PL shoulder; black borders
signed: LLC below image in white: Sandy Skoglund \'86 20/25 Sink and Tub
title: Sink and Tub
